name: Cash Crusade
description:
Ludum Dare 40 Entry. The theme was "the more you have, the worse it is."

Use the arrow keys to move, press up to look up. Space fires your handcuff gun, hit the criminals with your handcuff gun to arrest them and gain ten dollars. The more money you have, the more criminals come.

If the criminals steal all your money, you lose. If you get more than 2,050 dollars, you buy protections and win.

There is probably some problems with the game, but here it is!
